{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = CRS309 - Cloud Router Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/crs309_1g_8s_in |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = MikroTik_CRS309-1G-8S+IN |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = CRS309 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -1G-8S+IN |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/29/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/MikroTik_CRS309-1G-8S%2BIN |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;98DX8208; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7 |cpu1spd = 800<!-- 800 MHz --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = <!-- true, --> |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|lan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 10GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = SFP+ |exp_sfp_num = 8
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = 12-57 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = PoE in |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2019 |price = 269 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/rb_files/CRS317-16splus-181112142620.png Block Diagram]
==See also== :[[MikroTik]] • [https://mikrotik.com/products/group/switches Switches] *[[MikroTik CRS326-24G-2S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 2x SFP+ cages, 1U, Dual Boot (RouterOS/SwitchOS) *[[MikroTik CRS328-24P-4S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 4x SFP+ (10Gbps) ports, 1U, Dual Boot, PoE output *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 3011 (RB3011UiAS-RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB3011UiAS-RM PPage] :10x Gigabit Ethernet ports, USB 3.0, LCD display *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 4011 (RB4011iGS+RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/rb4011igs_rm PPage] : 10x GbE ports, 1x SFP+ port, PoE 802.3af/at
[[Category:English Documentation]]
